titles.title: Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act
To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Ebenezer D. Bassett, the first African-American diplomat.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/13/2014--Introduced. Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act - Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Ebenezer D. Bassett.
